mv.starring: Rajinikanth, Ramya Krishnan, Soundarya Raghu
mv.synopsis: Padayappa (Rajinikanth) is an engineer who visits his home town to attend his younger sisters (Sithara) engagement. His sister is engaged to Suryaprakash (Nasser), his maternal uncles (Radha Ravi)son. After this happy occasion, Padayappas foster paternal uncle (Manivannan) demands a share in the family property. However, standing true to his words that the family property should not be divided, Padayappas father (Sivaji Ganesan) bequeaths the entire property to him. His family is then forced to leave their home.

mv.starring: Zoe Saldana, Cliff Curtis, Oona Chaplin, Stephen Lang, Sigourney Weaver, Sam Worthington
mv.synopsis: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.

mv.starring: Nandamuri Balakrishna, Aadhi, Samyukhta menon
mv.synopsis: A heartwarming journey explores the connection between childrens innocence, the natural world, and spiritual faith as communities strive for progress.

mv.starring: Ranveer Singh, Sanjay Dutt, Arjun Rampal, R Madhavan, Akshaye Khanna, Sara Arjun
mv.synopsis: Set in the world of Indian intelligence, Dhurandhar follows a covert officer on a high-stakes mission rooted in historical events. The film blends high-octane action sequences, Shakespearean betrayals, and intricate espionage tradecraft, centered on the lives of the unknown men.
mv.adultMessage: This movie has been rated 'A' and is for audiences above the age of 18. Please carry a valid photo ID/age proof to the theatre. No refund of tickets once bought.

films.subtitle: English

mv.starring: Jason Bateman, Fortune Feimster, Ginnifer Goodwin
mv.synopsis: After cracking the biggest case in Zootopia's history, rookie cops Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde find themselves on the twisting trail of a great mystery when Gary De’Snake arrives and turns the animal metropolis upside down. To crack the case, Judy and Nick must go undercover to unexpected new parts of town, where their growing partnership is tested like never before.

mv.filmName: TERE ISHK MEIN (HINDI WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 16+)
mv.starring: Dhanush, Kriti Sanon
mv.synopsis: Shankar and Mukti's intense love story unfolds against the backdrop of Benaras, exploring surrender and transformation through an all-consuming romance that heals, hurts, and changes them

mv.starring: Mammootty, Rajisha Vijayan
mv.synopsis: A routine Kerala Police inquiry in the quiet village of Kottayikonam takes an unexpected turn when a trail of seemingly minor clues unravels into a string of disturbing cases. The investigation soon reveals some unsolved mysteries that have lingered in many cases. The strange story unfolds through the investigation against some brilliant strategies of obstructions against their pathways.

mv.starring: Vemal, Srushti Dange, Yogi Babu, John Vijay, Mahima Gupta
mv.synopsis: Mahasenha is a Tamil movie starring Vemal, Srushti Dange, Yogi Babu, Kabir Duhan Singh and John Vijay in prominent roles. It is written and directed by Dhinesh Kalaiselvan.

mv.starring: Kavin Raj, Andrea Jeremiah
mv.synopsis: 440 crores stolen. Seven days to get it back. A game of greed, betrayal and intrigue culminates in an explosive climax in this story of a greedy man, a conniving woman, and an uncanny guy with a bag full of tricks.

films.filmName: KIS KISKO PYAAR KAROON 2 (HINDI WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 16+)
films.subtitle: English

mv.starring: Kapil Sharma, Manjot Singh, Hira Warina, Tridha Choudhary, Parul Gulati, Ayesha Khan
mv.synopsis: Every time Mohan Sharma tries to marry his true love Saniya Mirza, he accidentally marries someone else ending up with three wives across three religions. Now juggling the chaos of multiple marriages, Mohan’s life turns upside down again when Saniya returns as Simran. To win her, he must untangle his hilarious mess before it all explodes.

mv.starring: Dharmendra, Sanjeev Kumar, Hema Malini, Amitabh Bachchan, Amjad Khan, Jaya Bachchan
mv.synopsis:
Re-releasing on 12th December 2025

Celebrating 50 years of Indias most iconic film, Sippy Films presents Sholays original uncut version restored in 4k and Dolby 5.1 by Film Heritage Foundation. Voted the greatest Indian film ever made in a 2002 British Film Institute poll and honored as "Film of the Millenium" by BBC India in 1999, the blockbuster film Sholay directed by Ramesh Sippy premiered at the Minerva cinema hall in Mumbai in 1975 where it ran for five years without a break.

Scripted by the famed writer duo Salim Khan and Javed Akhtar (billed as Salim-Javed), the film described as a curry western, is a landmark of Indian cinema that is a mosaic of all genres: an action-thriller, revenge drama, a comedy and a tragedy set to music, song and dance composed by the iconic music composer R.D. Burman. Inspired by films like Sergio Leones Once Upon A Time in the West (1968), Akira Kurosawas Seven Samurai (1954) and John Sturges film The Magnificent Seven (1960), Indias first 70mm film and the first Hindi film to use stereophonic sound featured an ensemble cast that included major stars Sanjeev Kumar, Amitabh Bachchan, Dharmendra, Hema Malini, Jaya Bhaduri and Amjad Khan in an unforgettable performance as the villainous Gabbar Singh.

mv.starring: Abdul Rafe, Mithun, Rithik Mohan
mv.synopsis: Naangal is the poignant journey of three siblings, un-identical twins and their elder brother, who are caught between a distant mother and a controlling, frustrated father grappling with personal and financial collapse. Living in a crumbling mansion without necessities, the children navigate a harsh world ruled by fear, obedience, and emotional isolation. Torn between their maternal grandparents` warmth and their father`s cold discipline, they learn to find strength, joy, and resilience in each other growing up in silence, yet growing strong.

films.filmName: BHA BHA BA (MALAYALAM WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 13+)
films.subtitle: English

mv.starring: Dileep, Dhyan Sreenivasan,Mohanlal
mv.synopsis: Bha. Bha. Ba. is a Malayalam movie starring Dileep, Vineeth Sreenivasan, Dhyan Sreenivasan and Balu Varghese in prominent roles. It is directed by Dhananjay Shankar.

mv.starring: Munishkanth, Vijayalakshmi Agathiyan
mv.synopsis: Karl Marx, a middle-class man in his mid-forties, lives in a small housing board quarters with his mouthy wife and his two kids. As long as he can remember, Karl Marx had only one dream, to buy a couple of acres of land in his native village and do farming. This middle-class man with his middle-class dream gets a reversal of fortune because of a good deed done by his father in the past.

mv.starring: Roshan Kanakala, Sakshi Mhadolka, Bandi Saroj Kumar, Harsha Chemdu
mv.synopsis: In the battle between love and lust, a tribal man fights to save his deaf and mute girlfriend from a ruthless forest officer, unravelling cat and mouse drama within the heart of the forest.
mv.adultMessage: This movie has been rated 'A' and is for audiences above the age of 18. Please carry a valid photo ID/age proof to the theatre. No refund of tickets once bought.

mv.starring: Kishen Das, Shivathmika Rajashekar, Harshath Khan, Namritha MV
mv.synopsis: Hopeless romantic Ajith, forced to work at a matrimony agency, clashes with practical boss Anjali. As dreams meet reality, he learns love isn’t magic but effort. Years later, fate offers one last chance.

mv.starring: Sandeep Pradeep, Vineeth, Narain Kumar
mv.synopsis: In the misty hills of Kaattukunnu, Mlaathi Chedathi and Peeyoos struggle to survive unforeseen challenges as the chronicles of Kuriyachan, a multifaceted businessman and outlaw, blur the line between myth, longing, and reckoning, revealing that he forever rules the hills.

mv.starring: Keerthy Suresh,  Radhika Sarathkumar,  Super Subbarayan
mv.synopsis: Revolver Rita is an upcoming Tamil movie. The movie is directed by Kaddipudi Chandru and will feature Keerthy Suresh as lead character.

mv.starring: Dulquer Salmaan, Samuthirakani, Bhagyashri Borse
mv.synopsis: In 1950s Madras, lives intertwine against a backdrop of social transformation during Indias post-independence era.

A bullied girl transfers schools hoping for peace, but her past trauma isolates her-until she discovers a series of secret letters hidden around the school, leading her on a mysterious quest to uncover their senders true intent.

mv.starring: Silambarasan T. R., Trisha Krishnan, Raja Krishnamoorthy, Babu Antony
mv.synopsis: A young, aspiring filmmaker falls in love with a girl who moves into the house above his, but her sophisticated nature does more harm than good to him.

mv.starring: Matthew Lillard, Josh Hutcherson, Elizabeth Lail
mv.synopsis: One year since the supernatural nightmare at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza, the stories about what transpired there have been twisted into a campy local legend, inspiring the town's first ever Fazfest. With the truth about what transpired kept from her, Abby sneaks out to reconnect with Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy, setting into motion a terrifying series of events that will reveal dark secrets about the true origin of Freddy's, and unleash a long-forgotten horror hidden away for decades.

mv.filmName: DEMON SLAYER KIMETSU NO YAIBA INFINITY CASTLE (JAPANESE WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLE) (UA 13+)
mv.starring: Natsuki Hanae, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono
mv.synopsis: As the Demon Slayer Corps members and Hashira engaged in a group strength training program, the Hashira Training, in preparation for the forthcoming battle against the demons, Muzan Kibutsuji appears at the Ubuyashiki Mansion. With the head of the Demon Corps in danger, Tanjiro and the Hashira rush to the headquarters but are plunged into a deep descent to a mysterious space by the hands of Muzan Kibutsuji. The destination of where Tanjiro and Demon Slayer Corps have fallen is the demons stronghold – the Infinity Castle. And so, the battleground is set as the final battle between the Demon Slayer Corps and the demons ignites.
mv.n: DEMON SLAYER KIMETSU NO YAIBA INFINITY CASTLE

mv.starring: Jayaram Subramaniam, Manju Warrier, Suresh Gopi
mv.synopsis: This delightful family drama depicts the complex sequence of events that unfold when a failed investors extended family, who believe that he is the owner of a vast estate, arrive for a vacation. How will they react when they come to know that everything actually belongs to his friend?

mv.starring: Gayathri Rema, Leo Sivakumar,
mv.synopsis: Untouchability still haunts music. The Parai drum, tied to Dalits, shows caste bias. Though music is universal, caste limits who plays. Has equality arrived, or does the struggle continue?

mv.starring: Darshan, Rachana Rai
mv.synopsis: A Saga of Power, Vengeance, and True Love.

mv.starring: Bipin Karki, Miruna Magar, Maotse Gurung, Prem Subba
mv.synopsis: A heartwarming tale of love and human connection unfolds amidst the multi-cultural beauty of Nepals Eastern hills.

mv.starring: S M Prabakaran, Meghali Meenakshi, Lenin Vadamalai, Tuhin Che Guevara
mv.synopsis: In a village trapped by untouchability and superstition, a determined teacher and his students challenge long-standing injustice. Their fight sparks a powerful movement that unites the community and threatens the local oppressor. As hope rises and conflict intensifies, the village stands at a decisive moment where courage must overcome the shadows of the past.

mr.synopsis: During the reign of Kadamba’s, the first dynasty of Karnataka, Bangra, a fictional feudatory ruled by King Vijayendra.
